榹榹榹

榹字的基本解释

榹
sì
〔榹桃〕山桃，落叶乔木，核果球形，有毛，果肉干燥，离核，可做嫁接桃树的砧木。
木盘。

榹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sī］
［《廣韻》息移切，平支，心。］
(1)盘。
(2)见“榹桃”。

榹字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榹； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页545第05
【唐韻】息移切【集韻】【韻會】相支切，?音思。【說文】山桃也。似桃而小。【爾雅·釋木】榹，山桃。　又【說文】槃也。【揚子·方言】承槃曰榹。　又【集韻】七支切，音雌。義同。

榹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
榹字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Slap
sì
〔Peach〕 Peach, deciduous tree, ball-shaped drupe, hairy, dry flesh, away from the core, can be used as a rootstock for grafting peach trees.
Wooden plate.
Slap
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sī]
["Guangyun" interest shift and cut, flat support, heart. ]
(1) Disk.
(2) See "Peach".
Slap
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榹; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 545 05
[Tang Yun] Xi, shift and cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme will] intersect each other, sound thinking. [Said the text] Shan Tao also. Like a peach but small. 【Erya·Shimu】Tuan, Shantao.　[Said the text] Pan Ye. 【Yangtze Dialect】Chengpan is called 榹.　[Jiyun] Seven branches cut, sound female. The same meaning.
